Description: Papyrus. Demotic letter of 12 lines on the recto. Verso: traces of ink (palimpsest?). The papyrus is torn at the top but the damaged first line (beneath which there is a space of 1.5 cm before the main text of the letter begins) may be the beginning of the letter. The left and right sides are preserved and there is a lower margin of 7.5 cm.
Curator's comments: The papyrus is torn at the top and the upper part of the first line is lost. This may, however, be the first line of the text as it appears to contain a proper name (which is probably the name of the addressee). There is then a space before the main text begins with 'Oh, may he live. Greetings'.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380987) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380987)
